extension.summary: Includes several Biquad Filter processing modes
extension.description: Parametric Equalizer post processing mode with constant-Q peaking filters (Biquads or Second Order Sections). It's very flexible, because you can configure several pre- or postprocessing modes with variable Bands. E.g. postprocessing mode with 10 Bands. For better configuration of the gain of each audio band it uses peaklevel meters.
extension.disclaimer: Note: it's a pre alpha version. At first please always use a low auio volume to pretect yor ears.
